column2: February 3]], [[1969]]) is a New Zealand born stuntman and actor who played various roles in [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)
column3: ''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]]. He is credited as the [[Witch-king]] of [[Angmar]] in [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
column4: The Fellowship of the Ring]], "Harad Leader 2" in [[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
column5: The Return of the King]] and as leader of the stunts department, but appeared uncredited as soldiers of all factions.
